meanings.definition: The quality of being modest or humble.
meanings.sent1: Her unpretentiousness shone through in her simple, kind gestures.
meanings.sent2: I admire his unpretentiousness and genuine nature.
meanings.sent3: His unpretentiousness made him stand out in a sea of flashy personalities.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of glitter, her unpretentiousness was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The unpretentiousness of the small town was a welcome change from the bustling city life.

meanings.sent1: The unpretentiousness of the cafe made it a cozy and inviting place.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the unpretentiousness of his approach to life.
meanings.sent3: The unpretentiousness of the movie's plot was a refreshing change from complex storylines.
meanings.sent4: Her unpretentiousness was like a clear stream in a world of artificiality.
meanings.sent5: The unpretentiousness of the garden gave it a charming, down-to-earth appeal.
